title: Ticket #6103: Touch up corner cases for proxy delegation network code
description:
Clean up some corner cases in the network code for delegating an X.509 proxy.

  • Detect and cleanup after a failure to read the GSI payload.
  • Don't cast the payload size value to a different type.

This is defensive coding. No problems have been observed with the existing code. Therefore, I don't plan to put this in the version history.
check_ins: 2017-Jan-20 15:42   Check-in [50032]: Defensive coding in network code for proxy delegation. #6103 (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
